page.title: 07SOCIETIES AND CLUBS
page.content: In Sunningdale there are many clubs and societies for all interests and ages.They include a photographic society which meets in the pavilion in the recreation ground once a month and has 35 members.Exhibitions are often held.The Ascot Stroke Club meets in the same place twice a month and is for people who have suffered strokes.The members are usually found through hospitals.There is a British Legion and the Woman's branch will be celebrating their 40th birthday soon.The music society meets in the church and they hold many concerts.The over 18 or 18 to 30 Club meets every Sunday at churches in the area.There is also Youth Club for 16 to 18 year olds and they meet once a month.There is also a Children's Society that sometimes hold 'Oranges and Lemons' fairs.
